element.name: Golem
element.description:
Golem Ability Score Increase.Your Constitution increases by 2, and one other ability score increases by 1.
Age.Golems are not born as mortals are, and they do not age as mortals do. They are constructed, so your character's age is based upon when you were created or emerged from the wild.
AlignmentGolems, especially inorganic golems, are programmed to carry out the will of their creators. Therefore, they tend toward lawful alignments.
Size.The most powerful golems, particularly those constructed by legendary artificers or born of fabled, magical sources, may tower above mortals. However, most appear a bit taller than most humans.
Speed.Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Hibernation ModeWhen you take a long rest, you do not sleep. Instead, you must spend at least six hours in an inactive motionless state. In this state, you appear inert, but it does not render you unconscious. You continue to see and hear with Disadvantage to your Perception checks. You also don't need to eat or drink, and you are immune to poison.
Designed for battles of deathBecause of the natural reason that golems are used they are built to be more advanced on their physical side. While creating your character you may choose up to 2 skill points to remove from intelligence and add to either constitution or strength.
